title: tudikkaiyanai nI
sahitya:
tudikkaiyanE nI tudi manamE shruti purANa Agamam paNiyum uyar


anupallavi

  vidhi mAdhavanAdi dEvar munivar paNIpati avanE nargatiyaruL valla


caraNam    adhipati pashupati aham nirai gaNapati sati pArvati suta sharavaNan sOdaranE
 edilum nirainda nava nidhiyum avanE jagamadilum varamaruLum mudal deivamAna
